posts.post_content: Haven't had this one all that long but have to part with it due to some unexpected bills.  Will grade Auth or 1/10 (I was told it was broken from a PSA1 holder).  Email me at [url]rgncubs@att.net[/url].  $500 included shipping.  Card is intact but there is paper loss and extra paper from whatever it was pasted to on the Piedmont back.  The creases on the front do not touch Cobb's face, making for a nice image.
